item.title: Survey Monkey
Survey Monkey
item.description: tl;dr Setting up a data capture survey with Survey Monkey Layout Changes - Related list on Site 1 – Fields to be updated. – Qns Where do we capture consent? hello ↩︎

item.title: Things I found while integrating PowerBI in Salesforce
item.description: tl;dr Many firms have microsoft technologies heavily subscribed in their technology stack. As consultants, we should derive value from the tools that our clients possess.

item.title: Using PermissionSet Groups
item.description: tl;dr Salesforce is providing flexibility in the way permissions are applied to users. The canonical way of applying permissions was to assign the least permission and progressively assign more liberal permissions to open access up. With permissionset groups, the platform for the first time allows for the permission to be muted; creating new variations of permissions.

item.title: Automation Rationalization
item.description: Nature of Salesforce Fluid Platform - state of constant improvement Lack of governance Low Maturity organization What do we check for? Workflows Process Builders Flows Triggers Trigger Handlers? Apex jobs? validation rules?
